website_summaries.verdict: Makes use of an ergonomically shaped handle, so you can avoid hand cramps while rolling.
pros: Tape used with the roller is sticky enough to work with all kinds of surfaces, including clothing, furniture, and car seats
Handle has a hole, so you can hang it for easy access storage
Includes an option for adding refill rolls to the handle
cons: Price per sheet is a little higher than average

customer_reviews.title: Quantity Not As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Evercare is a great brand but do not buy from this seller. The roller and refills seem old. I also only received 200 sheets (a 60 sheet roller and two 70 sheet refills) NOT 220 as advertised (a 100 sheet roller and two 60 sheet refills). Not worth my headache to return so just leaving an honest review and never purchasing from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Best Pet Roller on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I hate cats... yet I married into my husband's house of three crazy senile felines. I've tried lots of rollers but they rarely work, causing me to have more fur lined clothing than an Alaskan hunter. These Evercare rollers are worth their weight in gold. Easy to use, easy to rip off old sheets, and the adhesive holds onto the hairs like a steel grooming brush. Can't recommend this enough.
customer_reviews.author: animefan88tv

customer_reviews.title: No longer always covered with cat hair
customer_reviews.text: Regardless of how often I brush our cat, there is always cat hair on my clothes. Previously, I used lint rollers that barely picked up anything. So I decided to try these. Amazingly, they lift off all the cat hair, and I only have to use about two sheets on an average sweater. These are light years better than any other lint rollers I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: FUR & LINT BUSTERS
customer_reviews.text: I pet sit in my home & need a product that helps keeps the fur from flying. These are the best lint rollers that I've found so far. I keep one in my car, by my bed &, really, every room of my house. I can't imagine my life without a dog, but I love not having to worry about hair covered clothes/bedding. Great product,
customer_reviews.author: BarkingDogs

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on pet hair!
customer_reviews.text: Hardly picks up any hair at all. Works on fabric lint but not on pet hair!
customer_reviews.author: Frogster

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: The rolls are thick, but the sheets aren’t very wide and they’re poorly scored, making it difficult to pull the old sheet off without shredding it to pieces. It works, but in my opinion not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: A Cat Lovers Best Choice
customer_reviews.text: Since we care for cats in our household, removing cat hair from clothing, chairs, bedding, etc. is a daily chore. The Evercare lint roller is the best product I have found. The sticky strips are very wide and roll of easily for quick disposal. The price is right for my budget.
customer_reviews.author: Giradeau

customer_reviews.title: Not "Extra Sticky" as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is not as advertised. Evercare redesigned their labels so I mistakenly bought the regular (non-extra sticky) from Target and it didn't pick up ANY pet hair. I've been using "extra sticky" for years with no issue and was happy to find these extra sticky's on Amazon. What I received, however, was the re-labeled new ones (non-extra sticky) that DO NOT WORK, not even close to the "extra sticky" as advertised. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: e11spark

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE! Item not as shown!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE! Item shown is not the same as item received. I wrote to the seller hoping to resolve this before posting a negative review and was simply told it was same item with different packaging. This is INCORRECT! I still had some of the item shown, and it is extremely sticky and strong! Paper is thicker. What I received is thin paper, not strong and hardly sticky enough to pick up thin thread or lint let alone pet hair. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LoriA

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This roller is great for removing pet fur from furniture. Not quite as effective on clothes; it does remove fur from clothes, but it takes more sheets than another brand I have. I should mention that my dog has short, wiry fur that's not always easy to remove from clothing and furniture, so this review is based on that fact. The used sheets are VERY easy to remove from the roller. And I like how the outside label can be rewrapped onto the unused sheets to protect them until the next time you need the product. The one I prefer for clothes ONLY doesn't have that. I will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joy M

customer_reviews.title: Not that good at picking up pet hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the reviews said it was great at picking up pet hair but I found at the ones at pet Food express locally pull up cat hair a lot better. We have two cats with gray hair so we go through these things.Also, it should be noted that it comes with two for picking up pet hair and one regular one. For both kinds I’ve had to go over and over and over things that have hair on them and even then it doesn’t pick them all up. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Book lover N

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky Roller
customer_reviews.text: I've use ones that were stickier, I have 2 cats and a dog so I get a lot of fur on my clothes, but overall, these still work and does the job. The only "annoyance" is that the roller makes squeaky sounds on each roll, I feel like I should spray wd-40 on it or something
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have bought other companies, such as 3m, and they are not as sticky. I have the "extreme" as well as this one for pets. I keep one specifically for the treads on our stairs because they tend to get dirty quickly, but unnecessary to vacuum. perfect. I almost have a problem with them because I use them so often.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Villeneuve

customer_reviews.title: These are great for removing pet hair
customer_reviews.text: These are great for removing pet hair! I have a collie mix that thinks he's a cat. He loves to rub against my black work pants.
customer_reviews.author: Margiesue

customer_reviews.title: Lint roller drops in quality.
customer_reviews.text: Evercare has been my go-to lint roller for years. My cat sheds a lot, but I always knew my Evercare would quickly pick up the hair around the house and on me! But it’s now smaller, shorter, and half as sticky as before. It is easy to tear sheets off, but I’m using about 3 sheets for every one I used with my last Evercare lint roller. It isn’t the quality product it used to be. I’m really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: No Stick
customer_reviews.text: I remember these being really sticky before, but these are not. Almost like they have been sitting on a shelf too long and have gotten old & dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Larla

customer_reviews.title: the best for multipet homes
customer_reviews.text: I love these rollers. I have two cats and a dog. My cats have long, fine hair that gets EVERYWHERE. No joke - i get covered just walking around my apartment. I have two of these: one for home and one for my office. The refills are awesome and it takes forever to get through a roll even tho i swear i'm consistently using them. It will take a lot for me to switch to a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: afran23

customer_reviews.title: Awful New Design
customer_reviews.text: The design of the handle has changed. I was really frustrated at first because the roller kept coming off and wouldn't roll freely. It took me a while to figure out the rolls should be put on with a particular end at the top. So if you find the same thing happening to you, remove the roll, flip it and put on again. Not happy with the new design. On the good side, these are very sticky and picnupnlots of cat hair.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Bercik

customer_reviews.title: cheap design
customer_reviews.text: the tape was warped, as if it was sitting in a hot area, the seams were splitting apart and seemed dry. The roller didn't roll, I have to roll it manually and this was one of the more expensive tapes. I erroneously thought spending more money would yield a better product, but not is this case.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Evercare is the Best
customer_reviews.text: There is no waste with this brand. The 'sticky' runs the entire piece of paper. The handle is very comfortable. Does not pull on nor ruin fabrics. You will not need your fabric shaver when you finish delinking a garment, furniture, carpet. You can purchase less expensive brands, but you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gail P. Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Sheets remove well, I didn't seem to have a problem with them not tearing off. They are sticky enough. Overall product is convenience and does what it should do. I ordered partly on price as I didn't want to spend a lot of money on this type of product. Yes, you do go through a lot of sheets it seems, but I don't feel that is a problem. I have dogs and I keep these handy, in my office, in the car and in the house for removing dog hair on clothes. On a pair of pants, I might go through 3-5 sheets, but for the price and what I'm using this for, I feel that is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Marc K Marsceill

customer_reviews.title: Much stickier than the other brand
customer_reviews.text: I had these before and ran out of them so I bought another brand. The other brand isn't as sticky. I have 2 dogs and I need the stickier ones. The Evercare brand is best.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Sticker than most
customer_reviews.text: This roller is stickier than most. I have a huge problem with dog and cat hair on our beds, and used to use an entire roll to clean it off. This product is stickier, so it trapped more hair. I was able to clean the bed spread with about ten sheets. And, the roll is bigger than what you can buy in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Not wroth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy about this product, I'm a veterinarian tech and we used this brand in the hospital but this is NOT the same Quality! It's cheap and keeps falling apart ... spent $14 dollars could have bought better at the dollar store
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: VERY good "pickup" of lint, hair, etc.
customer_reviews.text: The stickiest lint roller I have ever used. I operate a non-profit animal refuge and have used many over the years. Best so far!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M.

customer_reviews.title: The best lint rollers on the market!
customer_reviews.text: These are “the best” lint rollers on the market! I’ve tried other brands and none compare to these! Well worth the money, use them for clothing, or furniture, etc. Keep one at work, in the car, or wherever you need a quick touch up on your work uniforms or suits. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ManicPanicChick

customer_reviews.title: This products WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I just adopted a Rat Terrier who is shedding like a tree in the Fall! I haven't had a shedding dog for a while, so I was looking for a product that would get his hair off of my clothes, couch, and bed comforter. This product was excellent at cleaning, throughly, all of these surfaces. I will definitely be reordering this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra G. Morrissette

customer_reviews.title: Best lint roller I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This brand was recommended to me by a friend who works in a veterinarian clinic. It's sturdy, comes with what feels like a lifetime supply or sheets, and they pick up so much hair and lint before having to change the sheet. Best part: the sheets are easy to tear off. It's only connected to the next sheet at the top and bottom instead of perforated along the entire edge so you won't be tearing half the sheet when you try to take off the dirty one.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Our Dog Sheds Spring & Fall These Save Us
customer_reviews.text: We found these about a year ago and they saved our sanity!!!!!! We have a pet specialized vacuum, the grooming brushes but we love her she sits on our laps. When she jumps down she leaves a lapful of hair! Only the extra sticky rollers will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Magness

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for pet hair.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 VERY hairy dogs and the regular lint rollers weren't getting everything. This thing is awesome! It gets all of it and I love that it came with refills in the pack. I'll only buy these moving forward. They work so well.
customer_reviews.author: Em Vannoy

customer_reviews.title: Not horrible, but not great either.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve come to the conclusion that these pet hair/ lint rollers are all the same. I don’t feel one brand is better than the next. I mine as well buy stock in one of these companies with all the money I spend on these things.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Leon

customer_reviews.title: Yes, These are the ones you want!
customer_reviews.text: Ever bought these lint removers only to find they are really light and basically useless? Yeah, me too. Not these. These are heavy paper. Lots of sticky ...sticky surface. This is the way to go for the proper lint remover (I've got 3 long hair cats ...believe me, I know)
customer_reviews.author: SusanMarie

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to refill - will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: This product is literally impossible to refill. I tried for about 20 minutes and severely cut myself attempting to put on the new refill. I had to cut the first one off, and attempted to squeeze and bend it every way possible to get the new refill on. I will not buy this product again - it is totallly unusable and dangerous to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey A Archer

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have pets!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say - we have two Shelties - hair is a daily part of our lives - gotta love em! These work well for a quick brushing off of the sofa, or our clothing or jackets.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Frasure

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best lint rollers! They remove lint and pet hair from just about every type of clothing. In our household with 2 dogs and a cat, these are a must have
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money...  : (
customer_reviews.text: The rollers I received DO NOT remove much of the dog hair on my clothes. One customer stated she felt the rollers from this seller are OLD or haven't been stored properly and have dried out. If I could give zero stars, I would have. The rollers also don't stay on the roller handle. Just a poor quality unit... don't buy them, you won't be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Byron

customer_reviews.title: If you have pets, you WILL need these in various locations in your home!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Siberian husky at the moment and 3 cats.......needless to say, there are fur balls everywhere in our home. We have to vacuum, sweep every day and still will see tumbleweeds of hair rolling through the house! These are great to have for your clothes so you are not walking out of the house looking like you've been attacked by a herd of dogs, great for the furniture and work very nicely on lamp shades!!! We have to have them!!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted something super sticky to easily pick up cat fur. But I think they might be even less sticky than the usual ones that I have from the drug store. The sheets are easy enough to take off though, so that's one nice thing.
customer_reviews.author: Victoire Michel

customer_reviews.title: If only they weren’t so expensive on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely pricey on Amazon. These are my absolute favorite lint rollers....and I was trying to avoid going to a store so I purchased them online.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Works well for removing cat hair
customer_reviews.text: My cat sheds on a continual basis so it's nice to have the pet hair removal roller there to just grab and take the hair off my clothes. They work quite well and are reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: SanDee

customer_reviews.title: It is great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to remove dog hair from my sofa, my clothing, my bedding and just abou everything my dog comes in contact with! It is the best one on the market and I have been using it for years!
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: it does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item at my local Marshalls! and it worked better than a regular lint roller. I have a German shepherd mix and he sheds SO much. since I purchased this item I don't struggle removing his hair
customer_reviews.author: Dee Chapa

customer_reviews.title: Handle doesn’t hold up.
customer_reviews.text: Good product but handle doesn’t stand up well enough for refills. I’ve tried these twice and the part of the handle wears away about halfway through second roll making that and the third useless.
customer_reviews.author: melbuk

customer_reviews.title: They Do an OK Job
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think these rollers are nearly as good as Helmac—not sticky enough. They only do a so-so job on pet hair. Doubt that I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Plant Lady

customer_reviews.title: Use on clothes, not pets
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by a friend. It does not remove much fur from my dog (beagle) and my cat. I will use it to remove fur from my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Super sticky, easy to use, great product
customer_reviews.text: My second purchase of this brand of lint rollers. My daughter has two inside cats and we have one that is inside/outside. This results in ALOT OF FREAKING CAT HAIR! These are fantastic for clothing, furniture and bedding!
customer_reviews.author: Robint

customer_reviews.title: Quality, no other brand compares
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST LINT ROLLERS!!️ Great for carpet on stairs, car upholstery and just about anywhere Quality sheers and stickiness
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Theresa Coats

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pet roller!
customer_reviews.text: These are the very best pet roller you will ever need! No other product comes close. They get the job done fast and effective. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: mia

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Handle doesnt match the refills. Com.j es off the handle as you roll. Which is MAJORLY annoying and ruins the use of the product. I mean, really? How cheap can you be. Just another thing I can't buy on Amazon....list is growing
customer_reviews.author: Bryn Rotolo

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: There are only 160 sheets, not 220 as stated in description. Value for money not there.
customer_reviews.author: Hollee Chadwick Jones

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t remove hair
customer_reviews.text: This was no different from using a regular lint roller only the handle is bigger.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisSetsuko

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: They are sticky enough and remove hair fine from the cat or from the cloth furnishings. Sometimes the sticky sheet is difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H

customer_reviews.title: Good value extra sticky
customer_reviews.text: I have dogs and cats . These are the best I have found that removes the pet hair , lint and fuzz from clothing. They are sticky and last quite awhile for me . They came on time and are a good price . I also like that I don’t have a problem removing the sheets .
customer_reviews.author: Terri garofolo

customer_reviews.title: The best lint remover
customer_reviews.text: these are my favorite lint remove rolls. We have 4 cats and with cheaper lint rollers I go through like 10 sheets just trying to clear cat hair off my shirt before work. With these, 2 sheets work. So sticky and amazing.
customer_reviews.author: jazmyn

customer_reviews.title: I don’t think it’s worth the money...use lint brush instead.
customer_reviews.text: This does just an OK job getting pet hair off of furniture. I thought by buying a special one for pet hair it would’ve wowed me. I coulda just used my normal lint brush for same effect.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow94

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sticky
customer_reviews.text: Works well..... but not as long as I had hoped, so must peel more often. The Evercare one I had before, with the blue handle was longer.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Boies

customer_reviews.title: They suck
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats and a rabbit. Lint rolls are a must!! These guys do a TERRIBLE job at picking up fur. I can go over the same area multiple times and it won’t pick up hair. Completely useless. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Broc Oppler

customer_reviews.title: These are the best
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many lint rollers and these are the stickiest and last the longest. Easy to tear off sheets and work great for pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adhe
customer_reviews.text: The amount of adhesive varies within the roll. I've bought them several times and had the same problem every time. I do think though, that the extra sticky works better than the regular version.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hair eliminator!! Really sticky!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lint and dog hair eliminator out there. However, it’s hard to rip off. But it’s the only one I’ll use. It’s far superior to any others. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Good customer!

customer_reviews.title: The best of all sticky rollers
customer_reviews.text: I have tried them all.. This brand is superior to all others. The pickups are amazing on clothes and on furniture. I won’t buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed after reading how great this product was supposed to be and it was stickier it was supposed to be. It’s not better than our gain ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sticky rollers. Picks up dog hair (have 2) and easy to remove each sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia A Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: This line of rollers is the best I've found. I have 8 cats and use the rollers daily. They do a terrific job
customer_reviews.author: Tracey W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So sticky! Our cat had super fond hair and this doesn’t leave a trace. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rockinshoe

customer_reviews.title: Must have for pet parents
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I have 3 pets and rely on these to keep pet hair off me and the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: ms-ks

customer_reviews.title: No good.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't easy to peel. And it didn't take off hair very well. Also as you wrote it it started to work its way off the roller.
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: Buy made in USA products.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and made in the USA. Love the fact that the refills fit in the handle to reduce waste.
customer_reviews.author: Lori C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great on dog hair
customer_reviews.text: My wife says these work better than the ones you normally buy at Walmart, etc. especially for dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: Paul N.

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY thing that gets cat hair off.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a lot of black and have a white cat whose only duty in life is to torture me with cat hair. This is the only thing that gets it off.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana Koyfman

customer_reviews.title: Great pet hair remover
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of the sheets in picking up lint and especially cat hair. Each sheet picks up quite a bit of hair. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Halle

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used
customer_reviews.text: Somehow most lint rollers I've used get less sticky after each sheet. Not sure if people have this problem with theirs too, but it never happens to this one. Also, it picks up so much hair! I only have to use about 2 sheets for my clothes while others I have to use 4-5. The best out there, I'll never buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Mate

customer_reviews.title: Best for pet hair’
customer_reviews.text: Excellent at picking up pet hair! I always reorder these and keep them stocked!
customer_reviews.author: Retired teacher

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats and I'm constantly defurring everything. This product works well for that. This batch of remover rolls is a bit more difficult to remove than other batches.
customer_reviews.author: Melyn

customer_reviews.title: Best one
customer_reviews.text: Best one yet. I’ve tried a handful of others, but this one works the best
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Love these rollers
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t live without these rollers. They’re much stronger than others. I don’t like lint or hair and these are my best helpers.
customer_reviews.author: grillgirl

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders on eliminating pet hair from clothing etc
customer_reviews.text: Best roller I have ever used. A bit more expensive but eliminates cat/dog hair from clothing etc. First used at my Veterinarian’s office.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Item arrived quickly in mint condition! I would highly recommend Seller!!!
customer_reviews.author: Frances M. Mercadante

customer_reviews.title: Roller Does Not Roll Well
customer_reviews.text: Removes hair great (stickiness) but roller is very stiff and does not want to roll which makes it tough to use.
customer_reviews.author: Slimmouser

customer_reviews.title: This equals TWO lint rollers NOT 3
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT 3 lint rollers. This equals TWO lint rollers. The refills are 50% of the regular roll. I would have spent 6$ less anywhere else. Scam
customer_reviews.author: Karena

customer_reviews.title: Reliably works
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing sticky enough to get the cat hair off. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ohlemeier

customer_reviews.title: Pet Hair Special New Handle with Refills
customer_reviews.text: The new ergonomic handle makes a difference. I like it and the sheets have more stick/removing power.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hales

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this procut a lot, i wish it was a little bit cheaper tho. They are several competitors that also do the same job.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Benavides Orizola

customer_reviews.title: Easy to change sticky surfaces without unrolling excess sticky surface underneath.
customer_reviews.text: Product works exactly as it should. Picks up loose matter when rolled over it.
customer_reviews.author: dkeith

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing stubborn cat hair.
customer_reviews.text: Extra sticky. Does a great job of removing cat hair from a long-haired 🐈.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Stovall

customer_reviews.title: The roll does not stay on the handle!!
customer_reviews.text: I should've kept my old handle & just bought the replacement rolls instead of investing in a new one that doesn't even keep the refill roll on.
customer_reviews.author: PPB

customer_reviews.title: Good adhesion
customer_reviews.text: Works great for removing cat hair from my clothes and furniture. Repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: D Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great pet hair remover
customer_reviews.text: Best sticky roll hair/lint remover I have used. Repeat buyer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tudor

customer_reviews.title: Great picking up cat hair
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat. This product is so helpful in removing cat hair.
customer_reviews.author: essies

customer_reviews.title: Not as sticky as previous ones
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work as well as ones I have purchased in the past
customer_reviews.author: LINDA KRAMER

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: The extra stickiness is a Godsend when you have 4 cats!
customer_reviews.author: irish9085

customer_reviews.title: Have a shedding animal in your house?
customer_reviews.text: These lint rollers do a great job of removing pet hairs from clothing, shoes, and furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Brewster

customer_reviews.title: These are very sticky and get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: With a number of animals in our home we are always looking for lint and hair rollers that actually work. These are very sticky and get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Quantity plus plus!
customer_reviews.text: I liked price and quantity (refills). With two pets. I go thru rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany713

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sticky but the sheets don’t always tear off cleanly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E. Long

customer_reviews.title: Picking the item off your clothes
customer_reviews.text: This item took the lint off my pants great product
customer_reviews.author: ARTHUR M. ARCHMBAULT

customer_reviews.title: Beige like masking tape
customer_reviews.text: Works better than the white plasticy ones.... this is the best pet hair roller out there.
customer_reviews.author: Terri S.

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I love it. But returned, cause I order wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Sticky!
customer_reviews.text: They work great and they are durable. I used one on my chair an it picked up the cat hair better then my vacuum does.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie kyelberg

customer_reviews.title: Rates a B
customer_reviews.text: Cat hair is tough to get off completely. This item works as well as other non pet specific rollers. Better than others. I would give it a B
customer_reviews.author: Giggra

product_meta.title: Evercare Pet Hair Extra Sticky Lint Roller with 2 Refills, New Ergo Grip, 220 Total Sheets (220 Sheets) (220 Sheets)
feature_bullets: (1) 100 Sheet Pet Lint Roller (2) 60 Sheet Refills - 220 Total Sheets!
Proprietary tape quickly picks up pet hair, lint and dust from clothing, car, bed, furniture or virtually anywhere
New ergonomically designed Ergo Grip Handle makes cleaning feel more natural.
Extreme Stick Plus tape removes the toughest fur and debris from clothes & furniture, which keeps you looking great everyday.
EVERCARE: the lint roller experts since 1956. Made in USA!
